author: stefano
msg: - fixed the eclipse-project build target so that now eclipse runs smoothly

- refactored the tool generation from the <init> target so that those tasks are compiled and called only when really needed (this allows better calls of intermediate targets, expecially on eclipse ant-view that doesn't currently work because can't find the XConfToolTask out of the box)
